grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 微細【ビサイ】minute, micro, detailed, delicate, subtle
細微【サイビ】minute, meager, meagre, mean
翠微【スイビ】approx. 80% of the way up a mountainside, view of a light green mountain, mountain that appears green from afar
kun reading compounds: 微か【かすか】faint, dim, weak, slight, vague, indistinct, hazy, poor, wretched, meagre, meager, scanty
